doc.description: Close the connection after a client is idle for N seconds (0 to disable)
Compress string objects using LZF when dump .rdb databases?
Set the max number of connected clients at the same time. Default no limit.
Don't use more memory than the specified amount of bytes.
Virtual Memory allows Redis to work with datasets bigger than the actual amount of RAM needed to hold the whole dataset in memory.
This is the path of the Redis swap file.
Configures the VM to use at max the specified amount of RAM. Vm-max-memory setting specifies how much memory Redis is free to use before starting swapping values on disk
Redis swap files is split into pages. An object can be saved using multiple contiguous pages, but pages can't be shared between different objects.
Number of total memory pages in the swap file.
Max number of VM I/O threads running at the same time. This threads are used to read/write data from/to swap file.
Glue small output buffers together in order to send small replies in a single TCP packet.
Hashes are encoded in a special way (much more memory efficient) when they have at max a given numer of elements, and the biggest element does not exceed a given threshold.
Active rehashing uses 1 millisecond every 100 milliseconds of CPU time in order to help rehashing the main Redis hash table (the one mapping top-level keys to values).
